Tasktastic is a powerful and versatile Chrome extension designed to revolutionize the way you manage your tasks and boost your productivity. With its sleek interface and robust features, Tasktastic offers a seamless task management experience right in your browser.

Note: This app is new. If people like it I will build more features!
